004 * The main class for the CS410J airline Project
005 */
006public class Project1 {
007
008  public static void main(String[] args) {
009    Flight flight = new Flight();  // Refer to one of Dave's classes so that we can be sure it is on the classpath
010    System.err.println("Missing command line arguments");
011    for (String arg : args) {
012      System.out.println(arg);
013    }
014    System.exit(1);
015  }
016
017}
